review_data.title: Amazing aperitivo in Zurich
review_data.content: Hands down the best Italian aperitivo place in Zurich! There aren’t many (if any) places in Zurich that offer a apero platter with your drinks at no additional costs - just like in Italy. Authentic and delicious - a must try!!

review_data.title: FINALLY!🔥
review_data.content: The best concept italian bar in Zürich! From the small-medium company ingredients, that you can find in the bottega at the end of the bar, to the real and classic italian Aperitivo, between different shades of Italy (take aways, restaurant/bar, fresh patisserie and the wonderful...More

review_data.title: Fantastic food, wine, and atmosphere
review_data.content: Ordering a drink in the late afternoon and evening will get you some great antipasti. Be sure to ask for specials, Ciccio always has something fantastic up his sleeve. Lunch is also great, especially the orecchiette al tartufo!

review_data.title: Apero sfizioso
review_data.content: Ci siamo recati in questo posto in quanto eravamo in cerca del vero aperitivo italiano e.. l'abbiamo trovato! Prezzi nella...More

review_data.title: Ciccio forever
review_data.content: Mi reco ogni tanto a Zurigo e parlando con amici locali mi hanno chiesto se conoscevo questo locale recentemente aperto,naturalmente...More

review_data.title: Tutto molto buono 🙈😋le piadine

review_data.title: Italian perfection in the middle of Zürich
review_data.content: Il Salotto is the perfect spot to satisfy some serious Italian craving in the middle of Zürich. Freshly bakes pastries every day, homemade tiramisu, great plates of Italian delicacies and the best aperol spritz in town. But the absolute highlight is the owner Ciccio who...More

review_data.title: All day location for Coffee - Lunch - Apero ...
review_data.content: Family style coffee - lunch - apero place. Lovely prepared cappuccino and freshly made pasta for lunch. Not to miss the salad as a starter with a secret recipe sauce.

review_data.title: Piadine etwas trocken

review_data.title: Un oasi culinaria che fa sognare😇👍
review_data.content: Grandissima professionalità, passione, rispetto e conoscenza della materia prima! Il tutto servito con semplicità e tanto amore da „Ciccio“. A...More

review_data.title: Nice!
review_data.content: Everything was just excellent! Great service, nice people and great food. The tuna tartar is delicious.

review_data.title: Always the right Place
review_data.content: Looking for a real Italian apero? Looking for something to gift? Looking for some special ingredients for a special meal at home? Il salotto is always the right place to go where you may get what you need by asking advice to the super kind...More

review_data.title: All round greatness
review_data.content: I came to Zurich on a trip with my friends, il salotto was nearby to the apartment we was staying at. I am usually picky as to were I eat and drink due to the huge amount of options to choose from. When we went...More

review_data.title: Finally an Italian style Aperol in Zürich
review_data.content: This place knows how to please the guests not only with courtesy, but also with some snacks while you are enjoy a good drink in your afterwork aperol time! They serve also delicious italian dishes (available also for take away) and they sell quality Italian...More

review_data.title: Das Essen und das Ambiente
review_data.content: Das Essen und das Ambiente im Restaurant ist ausgezeichnet. Ich geniesse es jedes mal wieder wenn ich dorthin gehe. Sehr...More

review_data.title: Great food and drinks!
review_data.content: Very welcoming atmosphere and the quality of food and wine are amazing with great taste. Definitely will visit in the future again! Highly recommend and suitable for family, friends and business people.

review_data.title: Gutes Essen, nettes Personal
review_data.content: Wer tolles Essen , gute Bedienung und ein lockeres Ambiente zu geniessen weiss, ist hier an der richtigen Adresse.

review_data.title: Great place with a wonderful Italian atmosphere
review_data.content: Very pleasant place to take an aperitif or eat. Very friendly service, all with a wonderful Italian touch. The coffee is excellent and of high quality. The products on sale on the grocery side are of very high quality and all come from different regions...More

review_data.title: Excellent italian experience
review_data.content: Warm and welcoming with a surprisingly big variety of quality italian products. The long list of wines, fresh pastas, cheeses and meats increased my appetite greatly and i ended up leaving with a big shopping bag. After this experience is hard to go back to...More

review_data.title: Ottimo locale
review_data.content: Accogliente, curato,cibo gustoso, negozietto con eccellenze del sud e non solo,gestori simpatici, insomma il top per la colazione il pranzo,...More

review_data.title: Italian Lifestyle ;)
review_data.content: I don't live in Zurich, but i'll for sure visit "il salotto" every time I am in the city! I strongly recommend you check it out. Very welcoming atmosphere, excellent Italian products and drinks, and of course Coffeeee! The best.

review_data.title: The best Italian experience in Zürich
review_data.content: If you want to experience the best italian/Swiss Italian food and products in Zürich you must visit this place. Additionally the owners are super friendly and professionale. Super reccomended

review_data.title: Amazing

review_data.title: Finally a fantastic Apéro in Zurich!!
review_data.content: An amazing atmosphere for after work aperitif in Zurich. They don’t hold back on serving small delicacies whilst having a few drinks!! review_data.title: Best Apero in town
review_data.content: Best Apero in town, I strongly suggest it to whoever wants to have a true Italian experience! Friendly environment and authentic Italian products.
